text: niccayamāka innayavañcakarkaḷ allāhvai vañcikka niṉaikkiṉṟaṉar. Āṉāl avaṉ avarkaḷai vañcittuviṭuvāṉ. Toḻukaikku avarkaḷ tayārākum poḻutu cōmpaluṭaiyōrākavē niṟkiṟārkaḷ - maṉitarkaḷukkut (taṅkaḷaiyum toḻukaiyāḷiyākki) kāṇpippataṟkāka (niṟkiṟārkaḷ). Iṉṉum, mikac coṟpa aḷavēyaṉṟi avarkaḷ allāhvai niṉaivu kūrvatillai
